member.name: T:portScanner
member.summary: Simple Unity helper that scans available serial ports and allows selecting one from a UI dropdown to force the COM port used by the stimulation script. Attach this to a separate GameObject and wire the method to a UI event (e.g., button click) to apply the chosen port.

member.name: F:portScanner.stim
member.summary: Reference to the component whose comPort will be set based on dropdown selection.

member.name: F:portScanner.serialList
member.summary: Dropdown populated with detected serial port names.

member.name: M:portScanner.Start
member.summary: Unity Start hook. No-op; port list is generated on enable.

member.name: M:portScanner.OnEnable
member.summary: Disables the stimulation component temporarily and populates the dropdown with available serial ports.

member.name: M:portScanner.Update
member.summary: Unity Update hook. No-op; present for completeness.

member.name: M:portScanner.generatePortList
member.summary: Queries the system for serial ports and updates the dropdown options. Adds an "empty" placeholder when no ports are found.

member.name: M:portScanner.OnDisable
member.summary: Unity OnDisable hook. No-op.

member.name: M:portScanner.selectPort
member.summary: Applies the selected COM port to the stimulation script and re-enables it.

member.name: T:StimulationParams
member.summary: Unity wrapper that composes a params layer (StimParamsLayer) over a core WSS implementation. Extends the basic interface with per-finger calibration parameters, normalized drive, and JSON persistence. All public stimulation APIs accept a finger string and map to a channel via .

member.name: F:StimulationParams.forcePort
member.summary: Forces connection to a specific COM port instead of auto-detecting.

member.name: F:StimulationParams.testMode
member.summary: Enables simulated test mode without real hardware communication.

member.name: F:StimulationParams.maxSetupTries
member.summary: Maximum number of setup retries before failing initialization.

member.name: F:StimulationParams.comPort
member.summary: Target COM port to use when is enabled.

member.name: F:StimulationParams.started
member.summary: True after succeeds.

member.name: F:StimulationParams.basicSupported
member.summary: True if the underlying core exposes basic-stimulation APIs.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.Awake
member.summary: Builds the core WSS and wraps it with StimParamsLayer. Tries to expose if available.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.OnEnable
member.summary: Initializes the WSS device connection when the component becomes active.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.Update
member.summary: Performs periodic updates and tick cycles for communication and task execution. Press A to manually reload the core configuration file for testing.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.OnDisable
member.summary: Ensures proper device shutdown when the component is disabled.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.releaseRadio
member.summary: Explicitly releases the radio connection.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.resetRadio
member.summary: Performs a radio reset by shutting down and re-initializing the connection.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.StimulateAnalog(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Direct analog stimulation using raw parameters. Prefer for analog sensors.
member.param: Finger name or channel alias (e.g., "index" or "ch2").

member.name: M:StimulationParams.StartStimulation
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.StopStimulation
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.Save
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.load
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.updateWaveform(System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.updateWaveform(System.Int32,System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the waveform parameters for a specific event on a target unit.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.updateWaveform(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Selects a predefined or custom waveform shape from device memory. Slots 0â€“10 are predefined. Slots 11â€“13 are custom.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.updateWaveform(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shape selection on a target unit.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.updateWaveform(Wss.CoreModule.WaveformBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates waveform using JSON-loaded builder definition for all units.
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.updateWaveform(System.Int32,Wss.CoreModule.WaveformBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates waveform using JSON-loaded builder definition for a target unit.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.loadWaveform(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Loads a waveform definition from external file.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.WaveformSetup(Wss.CoreModule.WaveformBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Defines a custom waveform for the specified event slot on all units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.WaveformSetup(System.Int32,Wss.CoreModule.WaveformBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Defines a custom waveform for the specified event slot on a target unit.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.UpdateIPD(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.StimulateNormalized(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Normalized drive [0..1]. Computes PW via per-finger min/max and stimulates.
member.param: Normalized drive in [0,1]. Values are clamped.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.GetLastPulseWidth(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the last computed intensity for a finger. For PW-driven systems this is PW (Âµs).

member.summary: Sets per-finger amplitude in mA.

member.summary: Sets per-finger minimum PW in Âµs.

member.summary: Sets per-finger maximum PW in Âµs.

member.summary: Sets per-finger IPI in ms.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.GetChannelAmp(System.String)
member.summary: Gets per-finger amplitude in mA.

member.summary: Gets per-finger minimum PW in Âµs.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.GetChannelPWMax(System.String)
member.summary: Gets per-finger maximum PW in Âµs.

member.summary: Gets per-finger IPI in ms.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.IsFingerValid(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the finger maps to a valid channel for the current configuration.

member.summary: Saves current params JSON to disk.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.LoadParamsJson
member.summary: Loads params JSON from default location.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.LoadParamsJson(System.String)
member.summary: Loads params JSON from a given file or directory.
member.param: File path or directory with default name.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.AddOrUpdateStimParam(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets a parameter by dotted key. Examples: "stim.ch.0.amp", "stim.ch.1.minPW".

member.name: M:StimulationParams.GetStimParam(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a parameter by dotted key.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.TryGetStimParam(System.String,System.Single@)
member.summary: Tries to read a parameter by dotted key.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.GetAllStimParams
member.summary: Returns a copy of all current params as dotted-key map.

member.summary: Updates per-finger calibration params.
member.exception: If finger maps to an invalid channel.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.GetCoreConfigCTRL
member.summary: Provides access to the core configuration controller.

member.name: M:StimulationParams.FingerToChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Maps a finger label or alias to a device channel. Supports "thumb/index/middle/ring/pinky" and "chN" aliases. Returns 0 on invalid or empty input.

member.name: T:Stimulation
member.summary: High-level Unity wrapper for the full stimulation model layer. Extends StimParamsLayer with proportional and derivative control modes, calibration constants, and model-based drive computation. This is the top-level interface that user code should normally interact with.

member.name: F:Stimulation.forcePort
member.summary: Forces connection to a specific COM port instead of auto-detecting.

member.name: F:Stimulation.testMode
member.summary: Enables simulated test mode without real hardware communication.

member.name: F:Stimulation.maxSetupTries
member.summary: Maximum number of setup retries before failing initialization.

member.name: F:Stimulation.comPort
member.summary: Target COM port to use when is enabled.

member.name: F:Stimulation.started
member.summary: True after succeeds.

member.name: F:Stimulation.basicSupported
member.summary: True if the underlying core exposes basic-stimulation APIs.

member.name: M:Stimulation.Awake
member.summary: Creates the full stimulation stack: core → params layer → model layer. Detects hardware if is false.

member.name: M:Stimulation.OnEnable
member.summary: Initializes the WSS device connection when the component becomes active.

member.name: M:Stimulation.Update
member.summary: Advances communication tick and listens for debug input. Press A to reload configuration file manually.

member.name: M:Stimulation.OnDisable
member.summary: Ensures clean shutdown when the component is disabled.

member.name: M:Stimulation.releaseRadio
member.summary: Explicitly closes the radio connection.

member.name: M:Stimulation.resetRadio
member.summary: Resets the radio by shutting down and reinitializing the device.

member.name: M:Stimulation.StimulateAnalog(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Direct analog stimulation using raw parameters. Recommended only for discrete-sensor triggers.

member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.summary: Returns last computed pulse width for the specified finger.

member.summary: Loads model-layer parameters JSON from default location.

member.summary: Provides access to the model configuration controller.

member.summary: Provides access to the core configuration controller.

member.name: M:Stimulation.FingerToChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Maps a finger label or alias to its numeric channel. Supports "thumb", "index", "middle", "ring", "pinky" or "little", and generic "chN" notation. Returns 0 if invalid.

member.name: T:Stimulationbasic
member.summary: Basic Unity MonoBehaviour wrapper for the WSS stimulation core. Handles initialization, configuration, and waveform control for connected WSS stimulators. Designed as the simplest interface layer exposing low-level stimulation functionality.

member.name: F:Stimulationbasic.forcePort
member.summary: Forces connection to a specific COM port instead of auto-detecting.

member.name: F:Stimulationbasic.testMode
member.summary: Enables simulated test mode without real hardware communication.

member.name: F:Stimulationbasic.maxSetupTries
member.summary: Maximum number of setup retries before failing initialization.

member.name: F:Stimulationbasic.comPort
member.summary: Target COM port to use when is enabled.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.Awake
member.summary: Creates and configures the stimulation core controller. Uses either a forced COM port or default auto-detected connection.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.OnEnable
member.summary: Initializes the WSS device connection when the component becomes active.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.Update
member.summary: Performs periodic updates and tick cycles for communication and task execution. Press A key to manually reload the configuration file for testing.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.OnDisable
member.summary: Ensures proper device shutdown when the component is disabled.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.releaseRadio
member.summary: Explicitly releases the radio connection.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.resetRadio
member.summary: Performs a radio reset by shutting down and re-initializing the connection.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.StimulateAnalog(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends an analog stimulation command to a mapped channel.
member.param: Finger name or channel alias (e.g., "index" or "ch2").

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.StartStimulation
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.StopStimulation
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.Save
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.load
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.updateWaveform(System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.updateWaveform(Wss.CoreModule.WaveformBuilder,System.Int32)
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.WaveformSetup(Wss.CoreModule.WaveformBuilder,System.Int32)
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.UpdateIPD(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.remarks: Broadcasts to all connected WSS units.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.Ready
member.summary: Returns true if the device has completed setup and is ready.

member.name: M:Stimulationbasic.Started
member.summary: Returns true if stimulation is currently active.

member.summary: Provides access to the core configuration controller.
